article_title: Despite objections, Ohio Senate passes bill allowing more end-of-life care instruction
article_text:

article_metadata.description: Over objections of some abortion opponents, the Senate approved a bill today that would allow doctors to issue medical orders directing the care a terminally-ill patient should receive if death is near.
